name: Elegant Access Computer ID
description: This extension provides a unique computer identifier and the local computer name to the Elegant Access Records Management System.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'self'; connect-src https://therapy.elegantaccess.online/; object-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; style-src 'unsafe-inline' 'self'; img-src 'self' data:
